translations: （清晰地）念（字），发（音）；阐明；宣布（enunciate 的现在分词）
（清晰地）发音，念字（enunciate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: "He is a thief, " Grandma said, enunciating every word.
sentences.translation: “她是个贼，”祖母一字一句的说。

sentences.sentence: "I speak English," she said, softly, enunciating each word with exaggerated care.
sentences.translation: “我会说英语。”她轻声说，小心的一个字一个字地说。

sentences.sentence: If any of your friends are still alive, "he says, enunciating each word," they don't know you're here.
sentences.translation: 如果你的朋友们还活着的话，“他说，每个字都说得清清楚楚，”他们也不知道你在这儿。
